thread.section_title: Dive Right In Scuba Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dive Right In Scuba | www.diverightinscuba.com
thread.title: James Schwartz
thread.title_full: Dive Right In Scuba reviewed by James Schwartz

author: James Schwartz
title: James Schwartz
text: I ordered a dive camera for a trip that was one week away. There was a shortage of this model camera nationwide. The customer service was outstanding. They knew the day I was leaving and everyone worked hard to not only get me the camera, but also the flash mount. There are not many companies that take a personal interest in the customers timining and work to make things perfect! Very positive!
